participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and expressive, Emily is passionate about sharing joy and positivity. She has a knack for making others feel comfortable and valued.
participant_1.background: I want to find a companion to share my love of Christmas with. I enjoy getting my nails done as a way to relax and pamper myself. I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be. I like spending time with friends playing sports and going to country concerts. I love the feeling of being free to speak my mind, even if it is not always appropriate.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Nostalgic and playful, Jake loves to connect with others over shared experiences. He has a warm heart and values deep relationships.
participant_2.background: I cherish my dog's ashes. I play games at the arcade, still. I got married to my high school friend. I'm from a small town in the Midwest. My favorite food is spicy tex mex.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for fun?
I like playing games at the arcade, still.
Do you like playing video games?
I play video games, but I also like to play old-school arcade games.
What's your favorite kind of video game?
I like all kinds of video games, but I especially like role-playing games.
Do you have a favorite role-playing game?
I really like the Final Fantasy series.
I've heard good things about that series.
It's a lot of fun! I've been playing them since I was a kid.
What's your favorite Final Fantasy game?
I think my favorite is Final Fantasy VI.
That's a good one! I've played it a few times myself.
It's a classic!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, cool! What grade do you teach?
I teach high school.
That must be fun!
It is! I love working with kids.
What's your favorite thing about teaching?
I love seeing the kids learn and grow
